scenario_description: Within the dynamic environment of a Singapore-based gaming company, lead developer Amir Tan and his diverse team are creating a new augmented reality (AR) game that blends virtual elements with real-world settings. They require an image segmentation solution that can seamlessly integrate virtual objects into live video feeds. The AI Practitioner class is presented with the challenge of designing a robust system that recognizes and adapts to various environments, ensuring a captivating and immersive AR experience for players around the globe.
